section.name: Guiding Question #2
section.summary:
Workforce-related resources that support classroom instruction

Now that you have generated some ideas for helping adults with LD face the challenges associated with the employment process, let’s look at some valuable resources you can use in your classroom instruction to support your learners’ success.

Guiding Question #2 asks:

What workforce-related resources are available to students with LD, and how can the ABE instructor link these resources to instructional strategies and the learner’s goals?

We’ve mentioned several general resources already:

  • Online aptitude assessments;
  • local library resources;
  • O-NET; and
  • LINCS online resources, etc.

Now let’s examine a resource focused on supports specific to your learner’s local region.
